main event: A UFO was reported sighted over Elkins, West Virginia on multiple occasions in January 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as a perfectly round, bright white translucent object larger than a match head,The witness saw the object while on an airline flight,The object moved in a straight line at a consistent speed before disappearing,The report indicates that the observed phenomena could have been attributed to a solar image,Significant correspondence from individuals in the Air Force regarding the sightings.
sighted object: a bright white translucent round object
witness description: William M. Fitzgerald Jr., a 41-year-old male and generally a student pilot.
